entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 07 January 2023
